_description: Dialogue between St. Peter Dominican and the Crucifix — six and eight lines in couplets

BLAdd37049.First Lines:
Ihesu criste gods soneþat on þe rode wald be
                    done…
BLAdd37049.Editions:
Doty,  Brant Lee,
                        ed.  
             “An Edition of British Museum MS Additional 37049: a Religious
                Miscellany.” 
         Diss. Michigan State, 1969: 287-8.
